name: Master Shipping for WooCommerce
author: wsjrcatarri

sections.description:
Master Shipping for WooCommerce is intended to help to handle complex shipping rules. You can create own delivery structure using mulitple departments option with help of conditions.

Master Shipping for WooCommerce is user-friendly, and there is nothing complex in creating complex shipping rules.

What it can

  • Supports multiple Master Shipping rates
  • Supports Shipping zones
  • Supports WooCommerce taxation
  • Supports volumetric weight calculation
  • Has option to set Shipping to address cost, and you can name as you wish
  • Multiple conditions
  • Has unique feature to see calculation result in admin
  • Has modern design in admin as well as on cart/checkout page.
sections.installation:
Installing via WordPress

Login to the WordPress Administrator Panel.
Go to Plugins > Add New > Upload.
Click Choose file button and select the zip folder of Master Shipping for WooCommerce plugin and press Install now button.
Click Activate button.

Installing via FTP

Login to your hosting space via an FTP software, e.g. FileZilla.
Unzip the downloaded Master Shipping for WooCommerce plugin folder without making any changes to the folder.
Upload the plugin into the following location wp-content>wp-plugins.
Login to the WordPress Administrator Panel.
Activate Master Shipping for WooCommerce by going to Plugins and pressing Activate button.

Creating a Shipping Method
Go to Woocommerce->Settings, Select Shipping Tab
Create Shipping zone if not already created
Add new Shipping method to Shipping zone and select Master Shipping option
Then go inside created Master Shipping method and setup it
sections.faq:
How do I use this plugin?

Follow Installation guide or watch video tutorial

How to uninstall the plugin?

Simply deactivate and delete the plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Plugin released.

1.0.1

  • Added cart item data for conditions.

1.0.2

  • HPOS Compatible

short_description: A WordPress plugin (required WooComerce to be installed) for creating custom shipping methods.
